review: Though we have a Roku, we purchased this Chromecast to watch movies online and use some apps from our Android phone that the Roku does not have. Definitely purchase the Chromecast instead of the Roku! So much more access and availability! I would have done so... I think the only thing missing from the Chromecast is a remote like the Roku... Overall, I'm so excited!
